name: Boot Attack - A reverse tower defense and idle game
name_original: Boot Attack - A reverse tower defense and idle game
description:
Hi, I'm Sami.

I am pretty new to Game Development world. I've started and dropped only 4-5 games since last year. Finally realized that without a deadline, I won't be able to finish what I started. So I participated at one by myself and made this game for the topic of Shoes in 2 days.

There can be multiple glitches and bugs, there is way more area that needs to be fixed and polished - especially graphically and in terms of level design - but I think its not that bad for someones first game.

Any feedback is welcome. Thanks,

Sami Şahin
